F

favoriteCellClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class view.GUI
Handles the event in which the user clicks on a recipe in their favoritesList.
favoritesButton - Variable in class view.GUI
Button on sidebar that switches the scene to the Favorites menu.
favoritesButtonHandler() - Method in class view.GUI
Switches to the Favorites menu.
favoritesButtons - Variable in class view.GUI
Section between the title and the favorites list where the openFavoriteButton, deleteFavoriteButton, upArrow, and downArrow buttons appear.
favoritesList - Variable in class view.GUI
Displays the name of each recipe in the user's favorites list using rows.
filterButton - Variable in class view.GUI
Button with an image of three bars on it.
filterButtonHandler() - Method in class view.GUI
Toggles the filterMenu.
filterMenu - Variable in class view.GUI
Menu that displays three sliders and their respective check boxes that can be used by the user to refine their search (lengthSlider, stepsSlider, ingredientsSlider).
filterRecipe(Recipe, int[][]) - Method in class view.GUI
Determines if the given recipe should remain in the search results based on the filters added by the user.
filterResults() - Method in class view.GUI
Applies the user's search filters to the current searchResults.
filtersActive - Variable in class view.GUI
Flag for search filters.
filtersApplied - Variable in class view.GUI
Message that appears in the searchInfo node that tells the user how many filters are applied to the current search.
formatSlider(RangeSlider, int) - Method in class view.GUI
Formats the given RangeSlider to fit with the filterMenu.
